question: Panchayati Raj System in India is laid down under which of the following?
explanation:
Panchayati Raj System of India is laid down under the Directive Principles of State Policy which are enumerated in Part IV, Article 40 of the Constitution of India.  Article 40 directs the state to organise village panchayats and endow them with
necessary powers and authority to enable them to function as units of self-government.
